\definecolor{myPurple}{RGB}{78,0,142}
%option: purple% \definecolor{main}{RGB}{78,0,142}

\pagecolor{myPurple}

% white
\definecolor{main}{RGB}{255,255,255}

\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{0.3}
\newcommand{\word}[1]{
	\textls[-60]{
		{\bf{\Huge\color{main}{#1}}}
	} 
}

\begin{document}
	\scalebox{
		0.5
	}{		
		\begin{tabular}{@{}l@{}}
			%option: en-one-line% \word{Human}\hspace*{-2.5mm}\word{Potential}\hspace*{-2.5mm}\word{Unlimited.}
			%option: en-table% \word{Human}\\\word{Potential}\\\word{Unlimited.}
			\word{Ihminen}\hspace*{-2.5mm}\word{ratkaisee.}
			%option: fi-table% \word{Ihminen}\\\word{ratkaisee.}
